p.d: LAU + BUGGE WESSELTOFT, HENRIK SCHWARZ, DAN BERGLUND AT THE EFG LONDON JAZZ FESTIVAL Bugge Wesseltoft - Norwegian pioneer of a new conception of jazz - and German electronica hero, producer and DJ Henrik Schwarz tackle the boundaries of jazz and house from both sides of the spectrum. Joined by Dan Berglund, bassist with the seminal EST and now an established bandleader in his own right, the pan-euro trio marks the release of a new recording for Jazzland, performing together for the first time in London.
